scripts.deploy:dev: sam deploy --template template.yaml --stack-name dev-news-extractor-stack --s3-bucket asif-news-extractor-deployment-assets --s3-prefix dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --region ap-southeast-2 --parameter-overrides env=dev
scripts.deploy:prod: sam deploy --template template.yaml --stack-name prod-news-extractor-stack --s3-bucket news-extractor-deployment-assets --s3-prefix prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --region ap-southeast-2 --parameter-overrides env=prod
